IP_SYN_2_var_5: we did the bronch for the rml nodule. saw a shiny vascular tumor in the rml lateral seg. touched it and it bled so we did needle bx first then put txa on it. then did the ebus part hit 4l 4r 7 and 11r all neg. went back to the rml with the therapeutic scope and took forceps bx. bled pretty good had to wedge the scope to stop it. stopped eventually.
